content: But really. When you scrape off that thin, fucking brittle, fucking useless veneer of Civility and Restraint, my head is a Frothing Cauldron of Blistering Hatreds, Suspicions Extending Into Infinity Along Every Axis, and Heart-Hammering Terrors of Every Description. The ONLY remedy — if any one of you idiots so much as murmurs the word “yoga” I will cut you in half lengthwise — I have ever found to offer fleeting relief is the blessed state of interstitial being permitted by lighting up a cigarette and drawing that Alleviating Goodness as deep into my lungs as a single breath would permit.
